title: Telegram API
description: Chat messages shared in Telegram Bots retrieved through Javascript, Json and HTML.

title: Animated Git Flow
description: An experimental attempt at React to visualize and animate the flow of Git Flow. [pt-BR]

title: UNIPH
description: Project developed in a Java course for the Web with JSF and JPA. The central idea is the creation of a system for universities that contemplates students, teachers, classes, disciplines and their respective schedules.
